div.pre: 1167 Vourla (now Urla; anc. Clazomenae), (1167) Ionia, 1911 Burial: c. 500-490 B.C. (Noe) Contents: 26 EL, 12 AR. Pot hoard Dardanus: 1 st. Lesbos: 1 st. Cyme: 1 st. Clazomenae: 12 dr.
